entry.summary: In this post, i’ll be reviewing CRTL certification, my learning and exam experience with some tips and resources. Introduction After successfully obtaining my CRTO certification on July 4, I immediately purchased the next course in line, CRTL (CRTO II). entry.title: Divide And Bypass: A new Simple Way to Bypass AMSI

entry.summary: This post is about a new simple way to bypass AMSI (Antimalware Scan Interface), that can be applied on small scripts, specially the popular AMSI bypasses.
